title: Follow live: Pacers off to hot start in Game 4 vs. Cavs
Mathurin tossed for sparking Cavs-Pacers fracas
description: Bennedict Mathurin was ejected, while De'Andre Hunter and Myles Turner were issued technical fouls.
author: Jamal Collier

title: Amorim admits he may have to leave if poor form continues
description: United's appalling finish to the campaign hit another low note at Old Trafford as they lost to a West Ham side that had failed to win any of their previous eight games.

title: 'We are all frustrated' - Marinakis defends 'scandalous' confrontation
description: Nottingham Forest boss Nuno Espirito Santo plays down owner Evangelos Marinakis' post-match intervention following the 2-2 draw against Leicester.

title: Nets are in unique position heading into 2025 NBA offseason
description: The Brooklyn Nets are in a unique situation heading into the 2025 NBA offseason, according to assistant general manager BJ Johnson.

title: Arteta rejects sympathy over Champions League exit
description: "I don't want anybody talking about it."

title: Straka snatches dramatic PGA Tour win after Lowry's late bogeys
description: Shane Lowry missed out on PGA Tour victory after two late bogeys saw Ryder Cup teammate Sepp Straka claim a dramatic win at the Truist Championship.
